word:
With many others you have been smitten with blindness. The infatuation of the ruler of the powers of darkness has been upon you. But it is no light matter for you to close your eyes that they will not see and your ears that they will not hear, and to darken your understanding that you will not be convinced 
                                                                           1347
of the manifestations of the Spirit of God. It is a dangerous thing to call the work of the Spirit of God the work of Satan.
